content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'tripfare' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.tripfare
	(
	 medallion varchar(100),
	hack_license varchar(100),
    vendor_id varchar(100),
    pickup_datetime varchar(100),
    payment_type varchar(100),
    fare_amount varchar(100),
    surcharge varchar(100),	
    mta_tax	varchar(100),
    tip_amount varchar(100),
    tolls_amount varchar(100),	
    total_amount varchar(100)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_tripfare
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.tripfare
(medallion 1, hack_license 2, vendor_id 3, pickup_datetime 4, payment_type 5
, fare_amount 6, surcharge 7, mta_tax 8, tip_amount 9, tolls_amount 10, total_amount 11)
FROM 'https://sasampledata.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxi/source/trip_fare'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://sasampledata.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxi/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.tripfare
GO
